Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1107.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStorySnowNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: 'Winter drags on.'}
{3: 'Luna stands on the peak, calmly observing the Mutated Red Tide below.'}
{3: 'She can "see" the Mutated Red Tide birthing alien "life" that doesn\'t belong here.'}
{3: 'She "hears" the wind carrying deathly silence, alien pulses that shouldn\'t exist here.'}
{3: 'Luna holds out her hand, letting snowflakes fall through her fingers. She felt "it" growing even before rescuing the Gray Raven Commandant.'}
{3: "Strange creatures take shape in the Mutated Red Tide, lurking at the cliff's base."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Luna', 3: 'What a disgusting presence.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: "Chaos has almost disappeared, and the new Agent Zero's silhouette is solidifying."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Luna', 3: 'Driven by basic instincts, so eager to steal my power...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'Looks like <phonetic=Agent Zero>you</phonetic> are nothing special after all.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Dim moonlight washes over the cliff.'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStorySnowNew.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Ui/Spine/2-11Spine/UimovieSpine/UimovieLuna/UimovieLuna02.prefab'}
{3: 'Her frame was reformed in the Red Tide, absorbing its Punishing Virus power and gaining a sliver of its control...'}
{3: "But the new agent isn't bound by the old rules. Luna is powerless against the mutated Punishing Virus."}
{3: 'The new Agent Zero won\'t abandon Luna as "a source of nourishment". It needs to master all powers to challenge the original will of the Red Tide—Chaos.'}
{3: 'Once the new Agent Zero consumes this area...'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStorySnowNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Luna turns slightly to the side. Behind her, out of sight, the Gray Raven Commandant struggles through the snow.'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "There will come a turning point... You'll find a perfect solution to the problems...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'She whispers, repeating the mechanoid girl\'s "language" the Gray Raven Commandant told her.'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'A turning point...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'It feels good to move again, Gray Raven Commandant.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She looks down at the newly formed Surge Mimicry.'}
{3: "She's been alone for too long, drifting through this desolate, frozen valley."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgUi/BgFightLoading66.png'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Luna', 3: "I'll help you keep the Red Tide in check and buy humanity some time to retreat. In return, once my sister is ready to enter the Inver-Hetero Tower, I want you to share whatever intel she uncovers with me.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1107.jpg'}
{3: 'She\'s already held up her end of the "deal".'}
{3: "She got intel on the Inver-Hetero Tower and, as promised, protected humanity's last stand."}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "Let's call this a new deal, shall we?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'I\'ll trade a "future" to see you safe.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg5001_13.jpg'}
{3: "Cold wind blows the moonlight from the trees. Luna's voice is lost to the wind."}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'If you really can find that "singularity"...'}
{3: 'As long as humanity survives... Earth might have a chance.'}
{3: "After all, she was born and raised here. She doesn't want to see this planet taken over by aliens."}
{3: "She'll hold out as long as she can, keeping the Red Tide from overwhelming humanity."}
{3: 'From now on...'}
{3: 'She must continue alone now.'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1107.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0.25'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Luna', 3: 'Good luck, 【kuroname】.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She jumps off the cliff.'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1107.jpg', 3: '1', 4: '0', 5: '0'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory698.jpg'}
{3: 'The pink-haired Construct stands on a distant peak, watching the Mutated Red Tide spread like a flood.'}
{3: 'The pages in her hand flip without a breeze, while two dice spin and stop on two identical numbers.'}
